nodes.text: The Bunka system was an inhabited star system centered around at least one star. Some time before 40 BBY, the star in the system collapsed, resulting in mass evacuations. The evacuations caused a division of Galactic Republic troops heading for the planet Ontotho to be waylaid.
The Bunka system was first mentioned in the comic Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple 1, written by Matthew Rosenberg and published by Marvel Comics on September 4, 2019.
